main event: A local resident reported sighting a large, domed, metallic object hovering above Glencoe, Minnesota on May 29, 1965.
interesting points: The object was described as having a reddish-orange glow from its underside., The object hovered for about 20 seconds before rapidly accelerating upward and disappearing., The witness observed the object for approximately 15 minutes and noted it glowed increasingly brighter., The object oscillated or wobbled as it moved and appeared about the size of a nickel held at arm's length when directly overhead., There were no other confirmed witnesses besides the local resident who reported the sighting.
